archimate:Principle.name: Privacy by Design
archimate:Principle.documentation: A set of seven foundational principles for taking privacy into account throughout the entire design and engineering of a system, product, or service. Originally defined by the Information and Privacy Commissioner of Ontario, Canada. Specific Sovrin Privacy by Design principles are a subset of the Core Principles in the Sovrin Governance Framework.
